description: simply dos not work, needle does not move, though sound is captured

It detected I was connected to JACK and I could see the waveform from the guitar I was trying to tune. I could not get the tuner needle to move at all and gave up after messing with the setting. It detects sound and shows the waveform but Ubuntu 20.04 Beta (development branch).
summary: Could not get needle to move

description: i installed this Programm on Ubuntu 19 and it works just fine
Deacent gui. Simple way to have sam fan with furrier transformation visualization.

It must have a bug. It shows [] instead of the played note, so it is not useable.

I hope they will fix it soon! It could be a very nice tool

It was able to detect all the notes on my piano, indicating which octaves as well. 

For people who've criticized it, learn how to use JACK, otherwise use ALSA.

Does not seem to be maintained since 2020.
There might be many features, but it is difficult to just configure the input.
Does not work although it captures the sound.

+2 étoiles pour l'effort ; ou -3 étoiles pour le résultat...

Jamais réussi à faire fonctionner correctement ce soft.
Instabilité de l'aiguille, la note affichée toujours coincée sur G1, les différents outils/visus, rien à faire, je n'ai jamais réussi à exploiter ce soft même en défonçant tous les menus.
Juste pour accorder une guitare plus proprement qu'avec rakarrack ou guitarix...

Désolé, sélection naturelle : personnellement j'ai installé "Lingot", parfait pour mes besoins même exotiques niveau opens et drops ; FMIT sera désinstallé sans regrets aucuns.
